json.text: This is Equinox, a deadly duality.
Divided into complimentary halves, gleaming the split between day and night.
Metamorphosis shifts between Equinox’s forms, providing limited stat increases that decay over time.
In the day form, Equinox received increased damage and move speed.
While in the night, increased shields and armour
Rest and Rage affects a target area.
In the night form, enemies are put to sleep—collapsing when damaged for a period of time.
In the day form, enemies gain increased movement speed, but become more susceptible to damage.
Pacify and Provoke emits a radial aura.
In the night form, enemies within range will deal less damage the closer they are to Equinox.
With energy drain compounding per enemy within range.
In the day form, Equinox grants nearby allies bonus ability strength.
With energy draining with each ability cast within the aura.
Break on through, Tenno. Mend and Main affects all enemies that enter its radius.
In the night form, lethal damage contributes to a pool of health that will be
evenly distributed to allies upon deactivation.
In the day form, your foes are initially struck with damage and begin to bleed.
When deactivated, a percentage of lethal damage inflicted is released as radial slash damage.
All of Equinox’s abilities serve a dual purpose and can be influenced with the installation of mods.
Adding strength mods will positively affect each of Equinox’s abilities.
Including duration will benefit Metamorphosis and Rest and Rage.
Coupled with ranged mods, all abilities except Metamorphosis will be affected.
A true Tenno must master the divide between night and day. Do you have what it takes?
